@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  to arrange TG team services on 10th Sep morning.

 

@Cean Llamas <mailto:Cean.Llamas@chalhoub.com>  to start creating PO’s by 2nd or 3rd Sep and raise WH transfer Request on 8th Sep.

 

@Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com>  Start installation of IT Equipment on 8th Sep early morning

 

@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  CCTV cameras to be connected on 8th Sep early morning.

 

@Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>   to arrange normal cleaning and pest control services start from 10th Sep/ share the email of stationery and Grocery with Simona and Rico.

 

Regarding Deep Cleaning will wait @Drazen Bilafer <mailto:Drazen.Bilafer@3d-consultants.com>  confirmation time of handover and if will be able to start deep cleaning at 7am on 8th Sep.

 

@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  please ensure to transfer the line to location Unit No: TDM-FF-148 on 10th Sep.

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me 050-3859997.

Regards,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK

@Cean Llamas <mailto:Cean.Llamas@chalhoub.com>  to start creating PO’s by 2nd or 3rd Sep and raise WH transfer Request on 8th Sep.

 

@Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com>  Start installation of IT Equipment on 8th Sep early morning

 

@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  CCTV cameras to be connected on 8th Sep early morning.

 

@Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>   to arrange normal cleaning and pest control services start from 10th Sep/ share the email of stationery and Grocery with Simona and Rico.

 

Regarding Deep Cleaning will wait @Drazen Bilafer <mailto:Drazen.Bilafer@3d-consultants.com>  confirmation time of handover and if will be able to start deep cleaning at 7am on 8th Sep.

 

@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  please ensure to transfer the line to location Unit No: TDM-FF-148 on 10th Sep.

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me 050-3859997.

Regards,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK
